case.title: Looking for a virgin or not too much experience. - 30 (New York)
case.text: I'm interested in something like the teaching part but I can learn as well because when two people connect there's always a learning experience. I'm very gentle and never hurt anybody in my life. I haven't been with many girls so I'm totally clean and drug free. I don't even smoke. If you're interested in something that you may have been thinking about, curious or just want to learn something new then please drop me a line.
